app_tagline: Your guide to all things queer.
auth_password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters long.

auth_connection_error_description: A network error occurred. Please try again later.
auth_terms_agreement: By signing in, you agree to our
auth_username_length_error: Username must be between 2 and 24 characters long.
auth_username_format_error: Username can only contain letters, numbers, periods (.), and underscores (_).
auth_firstname_length_error: First name must be between 2 and 24 characters long.
auth_lastname_length_error: Last name must be between 2 and 24 characters long.
auth_password_length_error: Password must be between 8 and 24 characters long.
auth_password_contains_username: Password should not contain the username.
auth_terms_required: You must agree to the terms of service.
auth_validation_error_description: Please correct the errors before proceeding.
auth_sign_up_failed_description: Please check your details and try again.
auth_email_help: This will be used for signing in.
auth_terms_agreement_signup: I have read and agree to the
auth_details_changeable: All these details may be changed later in your account settings.
callout_info_tooltip: This callout is used for general notes.
callout_success_tooltip: This callout is used for tips and useful information.
callout_warning_tooltip: This callout is used for important information.
callout_error_tooltip: This callout is used for critical information and prohibitions.
callout_commentary_tooltip: This callout is used for developer commentary.
callout_ideation_tooltip: This alert is used for ideas and brainstorming.
callout_source_tooltip: This alert is used for direct commentary of the author.
blog_status_error_message: Failed to fetch posts: {errorMessage}. Please try again later.
page_branding_description: The assets used across our brand, as well as their usage guidelines.
page_branding_section_typography_descrip: The fonts used across our brand.
page_branding_section_typography_paragra: This section covers approved typefaces, and some helpful usage tips.
Any typeface not referenced in this section is considered unauthorized for use.
page_blog_description: Read our latest blog posts and project updates.
newsletter_description: Stay updated on new posts and updates. Unsubscribe at any time.
home_hero_description: We are QueerKit. A community-driven guide building the most comprehensive resource for LGBTQ+ knowledge and connection.
home_resources_wiki_description: Our community-driven encyclopedia covering everything from terminology to queer history.
home_resources_community_description: Finding safe spaces, local organizations, and ways to connect with the global queer family.
home_resources_identity_description: Deep dives into gender, sexuality, and the nuances of self-expression and discovery.
home_vision_title: Building a world of inclusive knowledge
home_vision_description: QueerKit is an independent, community-focused initiative. We don't just aggregate data; we curate a safe, accurate, and living knowledge base that respects the diversity of the queer experience.
home_news_description: Stay updated with the latest news and additions to QueerKit.
home_news_item_history_description: Our new section on early 20th-century queer activism is now available.
home_news_item_mod_description: We're looking for passionate individuals to help maintain our safe spaces.
home_news_item_term_description: Updating our glossary with more modern and inclusive definitions.
home_join_privacy: We respect your privacy. Only major community updates.
about_hero_description: We are a collective of researchers, creators, and advocates building the next generation of queer knowledge.
about_mission_description: To provide accurate, inclusive, and empowering resources for the LGBTQ+ community.
about_mission_p2: Founded by a collective of advocates and community builders, QueerKit is dedicated to preserving the history and empowering the future of the LGBTQ+ community. We believe in the power of shared knowledge to bring people together.
about_values_community_description: Everything we do starts and ends with the community experience. We listen, we learn, and we build for our collective.
about_values_innovation_description: We explore new ways to organize and present information to create accessible and memorable resources.
about_values_collaboration_description: Great resources are built by great teams. We foster an environment of trust, respect, and open communication.
about_join_us_description: Be a part of something extraordinary.
careers_hero_description: Join us in crafting the future of queer knowledge.
careers_culture_description: We foster a culture of inclusivity, collaboration, and continuous learning.
careers_culture_p2: We believe that the best work happens when people feel safe, supported, and inspired. At QueerKit, we empower our team to take ownership, experiment, and grow.
careers_benefits_health_desc: Access to community-vetted mental and physical health guides.
careers_benefits_time_desc: Contribute as much or as little as you want, on your own schedule.
careers_benefits_development_desc: Learn about research, moderation, and community management.
careers_benefits_gear_desc: Access to our internal tools and platforms to help you build.
careers_offices_remote_description: We are a distributed team with flexible working hours. Work from anywhere that inspires you.
careers_offices_spaces_description: Our community thrives in safe spaces online and offline. Join our Discord or local meetups to connect with the team.
careers_no_positions: No open roles at the moment. Check back later!
